revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AVM |model=FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7170 |revision=v2 |series=G125 |is_manuf=No |availability=common |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7200 |cpu1_cspeed=212 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640MTTC-90G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Infineon |ram1_model=HYB39SC256160FE-7 |expansion_if_types=USB 1.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=TNETW3422 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996FC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7170 |default_ssid_regex=^FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7170$ |default_ip=192.168.178.1 |oui=00:04:0E }} * [http://www.avm.de/en/service/manuals/FRITZBox/Manual_FRITZBox_Fon_WLAN_7170.pdf Manual] * {{boxmatrix|7170,7170v1,7170v2}} * {{fritzbox|7170}} * [http://deve.loping.net/files/FRITZ-WRT-HOWTO.html HOWTO for OpenWRT on the FRITZ!Box 7170]
There are multiple revisions (v1 and v2) of the device. v1 uses a larger FPGA and a ADM6996LC switch and v2 uses a smaller FPGA and a ADM6996FC switch. See the BoxMatrix 7170 article for a version comparison.
